i like to drink at bars with friends.
I love my music and playing guitar is my favorite way to relax after a long day.

i type one handed.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned the value of hard work and perseverance.
I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music.
I'm an independent person who likes my own company, but I still love my family.
I am a female in my early 20s.
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.

content.text: I'm doing well! Thanks for asking. How are you today?
I'm doing well, too! I'm a stay-at-home mom, and I'm trying to raise my children as best I can despite my health problems.
That sounds like a lot of work! I'm sure you're doing a great job. What are your health problems?
I have a lot of trouble walking, so I have to type one handed. But I love my kids, and I'm doing everything I can for them.
That's really impressive! I'm sure your kids are lucky to have you.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I love playing guitar. I love all kinds of music, but I especially love country music.
That's awesome! I love country music too.
I don't, but I love to sing.
That's great! I love to sing too.
Maybe we should start a band together!
Great! I'll start practicing my guitar.
